sectionHeading: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday August 2 at 6:30 a.m.

incidentType: Traffic Advisory for I-75S at Clays Ferry Bridge This Evening:
location: Left and center lanes closed tonight 8/1 from 7 p.m. to midnight.

incidentType: Traffic Advisory for I-75S at Clays Ferry Bridge This Evening:
location: Crews will be performing bridge deck patching work.  Expect significant delays in the area.

incidentType: Traffic Signal Deactivation on N Upper St:
location: The signals at W Sixth St and W Fifth St will become inactive at 10 a.m. on Wednesday 8/2.

incidentType: Traffic Signal Deactivation on N Upper St:
location: ALL-WAY stop signs will be in place, and the signals will flash red on all sides.

incidentType: Traffic Signal Deactivation on N Upper St:
location: Use added caution as traffic adjusts to the new control measures.
